TopicTitle: Station-in-a-box! Easy to build high capacity science station!

Articles.Content:
I made this craft for a request in my company(link in sig):

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/CQ7ra)

Instructions:

Here's the launcher subassembly:

[http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-launcher](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-launcher)

And the core(Place a cupola in the VAB and attach this below that):

[http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-core](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-core)

Dock 3 of these to the core(Place a probe in the VAB, add this subassembly then reroot to the top docking port):

[http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Crew-modules](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Crew-modules)

Then dock three of these on(Same instructions for setting it up in the VAB as the Crew modules):

[http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-supply-module](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-station-supply-module)

Individually launch each of the modules and dock them.

Enjoy!
